about_the_game:
Grab the needle to feel like you’re on stage with the original game soundtrack to Hi-Fi RUSH! This OST comes crammed with over three hours of original music performed by The Glass Pyramids, Shuichi Kobori, Masatoshi Yanagi and more!

  • Jam out to more than 60 tracks - that’s over three hours of tunes!
  • Features original compositions by Shuichi Kobori, Masatoshi Yanagi, REO and more!
  • Includes the original Streamer Mode tracks from Hi-Fi RUSH’s boss battles by The Glass Pyramids!
  • May or may not feature a secret track! (shhh!)
